attributes.action: introduce a variable speed limit on motorways at night i.e. 8pm 80 mph 9pm 90 mph, 10 pm to 7am 100 mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At 7am the speed limit would revert to 70mph until 8pm that evening.  This would encourage the fuller use of motorways whilst reducing conjestion at a stroke with no costly bureaucracy.  It should be introduced initially as a 1 year trial since there will be those that argue there will be a larger number of road deaths and accidents.  The trial will reveal whether or not this is so.
